DOC.brief_summary: Demonstrate the reduction of bacteria on the skin.
DOC.detailed_description: Examine the antimicrobial cloth effects on bacteria of the abdomen and groin area.
DOC.criteria: Males or Females 16 years of age or older Signed informed consent Good Health Six inches of abdomen and groin areas without tattoos, or skin disorders Dermatological Conditions Sensitivity to latex Sensitivity to CHG
